Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.Connector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveMqConnector, JeroMqConnector, MinaConnector, RmiConnector
    public abstract class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Connector class provides a partial implementation of the manager of the connections towards some remote actor spaces.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isBroker

        public final boolean isBroker()
        Checks if the connector acts as communication broker. A broker connector starts both the process for connecting the actor spaces and the process for closing all the connections between them.
        Returns:
        true if the connector acts as the broker.

      • setBroker

        public final void setBroker​(boolean f)
        Sets whether or not this connector acts as broker. A broker connector starts both the process for connecting the actor spaces and the process for closing all the connections between them.
        Parameters:
        f - if true, then the connector acts as broker.

      • discover

        protected abstract java.util.Set<Reference> discover()
        Discovers the actor space service provider references of the connected actor spaces.
        Returns:
        the references.

      • create

        protected abstract Connection create​(Reference d)
        Creates a connection for a specific communication technology.
        Parameters:
        d - the remote actor space service provider reference.
        Returns:
        the new connection.

      • destroy

        protected abstract void destroy​(Reference d)
        Destroys a connection for a specific communication technology.
        Parameters:
        d - the remote actor space service provider reference.
